name: Google - Grid enhancements Plus
description: A style I was originally going to integrate into this, but then figured it was beyond the scope of that style, so I made a new style for it instead. Do also pair with this style which hides the Google Grid scrollbar, as it looks ugly otherwise. This style comes after the rollout of a new Google feature known as Google Grid, a button that provides one-click access to other Google services, and is basically a modernized revamp of the "More" menu, with a link to a page with all available Google services. This style is ideal for using a background on the Google front page.
